ygData.subject: RE: soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Uhmmm, Harm, why not play your lev 32 song and _really_ speed up their mana?  Sylly. p.s. ok, ok, so you mean you _used_ to do this - hehehe... p.s.s. does
ygData.messageBody:
Uhmmm, Harm, why not play your lev 32 song and _really_ speed up their mana?
<eg>

Sylly.

p.s. ok, ok, so you mean you _used_ to do this - hehehe...

p.s.s. does jig twist with clarity <eg> (hey I am on a roll!)


-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 7:01 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] soloing

From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>

>When people ask me to play Jig to increase mana, I use a
>condensed version of Talies explanation and they usually
>accept it. If they don't, their problem not mine.

If someone in my group
asked me to play Jig to speed up their mana (a perceived
notion mind you) - I will happily do it.
